tasks.title: My Resume
tasks.description: During the six-month internship at CyberDude Networks (Pvt) Ltd, the task assigned was to assess the proficiency level in HTML and vanilla CSS as part of measuring the interns' knowledge.

tasks.title: My Portfolio
tasks.description: During the six-month internship at CyberDude Networks (Pvt) Ltd, the objective of this task was to cultivate expertise in HTML and vanilla CSS.

tasks.title: My Portfolio - Basic Bootstrap
tasks.description: The assigned task involved understanding the fundamental aspects of the Bootstrap framework by developing the same portfolio using HTML, Vanilla CSS, and Bootstrap. This approach helps to facilitate comprehension of Bootstrap's utility and functionality.

tasks.title: Movie Listing - Bootstrap
tasks.description: It is a responsive UI project designed to enhance the knowledge of the Bootstrap framework. With a combination of HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and SCSS, this project replicates a modern and user-friendly web interface for a fictional "Movie Cafe." The goal of this project is to get a deeper understanding of Bootstrap components and customizations.

tasks.title: WhatsApp UI Clone - TailwindCSS
tasks.description: This project is a clone of the WhatsApp iOS application's user interface, developed using HTML and Tailwind CSS. The goal of this project is to enhance the skills in UI/UX to understand about basics of "TailwindCSS" and to identify the difference between Bootstrap and TailwindCSS.

tasks.title: Instagram UI Clone - TailwindCSS
tasks.description: This project is a clone of the Instagram application's user interface, developed using HTML and Tailwind CSS. The main goal of this project is to enhance the skills in UI/UX to understand about TailwindCSS more deeply.

tasks.title: Google Pay UI Clone - TailwindCSS
tasks.description: This project is a clone of the Google Pay (GPAY) application's user interface, developed using HTML and Tailwind CSS. The main goal of this project is to enhance the skills in UI/UX to understand TailwindCSS more deeply.

tasks.title: JavaScript DOM - Landing Page Idea
tasks.description: This task was held/considered as Skill Analysis. The goal of this task is to measure interns' (our) skills which are learned through the previous tasks. Based on this purpose, this JavaScript DOM Landing page was designed. with responsive design with a little bit of JavaScript interactivity.

tasks.title: Simple Form - Vanilla JavaScript
tasks.description: This task was given to understand how to work with form data such as getting data from users and displaying those data in UI through JavaScript and to understand the concept of DOM.

tasks.title: Form with LocalStorage - JS
tasks.description: This task was given to understand form validation/data validation. Because it is the most important aspect. This task was given to learn about data validation with various data types and to get a basic idea about localStorage concepts such as saving, showing, and deleting the data from localStorage with the use of JavaScript.

tasks.title: Interns Profile - Display data based on JSON
tasks.description: This task was given to get the idea about how to work with the JSON data such as creating a JSON file with the data set, and displaying those data in UI based on the conditions or requirements of the users.

tasks.title: IP Finder - DOM & API
tasks.description: This task was given to get an idea about how to work with the API, various types of fetching data from API, and display those data in UI based on the conditions or requirements of the users.

tasks.title: YTU - JS DOM
tasks.description: This task was given to get more clarity on the JavaScript DOM (Document Object Model). Through this task, we can achieve when the user gives the URL of the YouTube video, it will show the thumbnail image of the relevant video.

tasks.title: Advice Generator
tasks.description: This task was given to get a clearer understanding of how to work with the API, various types of fetching data from API, and display those data in UI based on the conditions or requirements of the users. Because, in the MERN stack, most of the time we need to work with APIs. Based on that point, these types of tasks were given by the mentor.

tasks.title: CNG Cost Calculater
tasks.description: This task was given to assess the skills of previous stacks such as HTML, TailwindCSS, JavaScript, JavaScript DOM, localStorage concept, and APIs. Through this application, the user can add details about the Criteria which is shown in the UI. When the user clicks the submit button, it will show the entered details in the table, and it will show the summary of all the records. Here, the form validation is highly considered.

tasks.title: Dummy Chat - React.js
tasks.description: This task was given to get a better understanding of React.js such as Configuring and creating a simple chat interface using React.js.
